```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


If I knit an Rmd document that includes UTF-8 characters outside the ASCII range (for instance, phonetic symbols like \textipa{[E]} or \textipa{[O]}), they never survive the transition to PDF (with output: `papaja::apa6_pdf`) or to .docx (with output: `papaja::apa6_word`).
